name: Monthly Production By Groups
query:
select i.item_group as 'Group::300', po.stock_uom as 'UOM::100', 
sum(if(month(po.actual_end_date)=1, po.produced_qty,0)) as January, 
sum(if(month(po.actual_end_date)=2, po.produced_qty,0)) as February, 
sum(if(month(po.actual_end_date)=3, po.produced_qty,0)) as March, 
sum(if(month(po.actual_end_date)=4, po.produced_qty,0)) as April, 
sum(if(month(po.actual_end_date)=5, po.produced_qty,0)) as May, 
sum(if(month(po.actual_end_date)=6, po.produced_qty,0)) as June, 
sum(if(month(po.actual_end_date)=7, po.produced_qty,0)) as July, 
sum(if(month(po.actual_end_date)=8, po.produced_qty,0)) as August, 
sum(if(month(po.actual_end_date)=9, po.produced_qty,0)) as September, 
sum(if(month(po.actual_end_date)=10, po.produced_qty,0)) as October, 
sum(if(month(po.actual_end_date)=11, po.produced_qty,0)) as November, 
sum(if(month(po.actual_end_date)=12, po.produced_qty,0)) as December 
from `tabProduction Order` po
left join `tabItem` i on po.production_item=i.name
where po.status in ("Completed","Stopped") and po.docstatus=1
and year(po.actual_end_date)=%(year)s and po.company=%(company)s and po.business_unit=%(business_unit)s
group by i.item_group, po.stock_uom
